2025-09-24T10:15:16.384670,sir link both xlsx files display boths rows and column yourself,"The first Excel file contains the following data:
To link these two files, you can use the `rno` column as the key to merge the data. Here's how the merged table would look:

Rows with `rno` 333 and 555 from the first file do not have corresponding matches in the second file. If you use a full outer join method, these rows will still appear in your merged dataset【13:0†source】【13:2†source】.",hk123
